pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Criteria of Seawater Quality of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國海水水質標準。

sentences.english: Which is the capital of America A. New York B. Beijing …
sentences.chinese: 北京是中華人民共和國的首都。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Ministry of Communications of the PRC is the institution in charge of the nation-wide highway undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 第三條中華人民共和國交通部主管全國公路事業。

sentences.english: Party A violates any Law or Regulation of P. R.
sentences.chinese: 甲方違反任何中華人民共和國的法律或法規。

sentences.english: Long live the People's Republic, Long live the great unity of people of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國萬歲，世界人民大團結萬歲。

sentences.english: The Economic and Commercial Counsellor's Office of the Embassy of the People's Republ…
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國駐南非共和國大使館經濟商務參贊處。

sentences.english: This standard is proposed by National Tourism Administration of the P. R. C.
sentences.chinese: 本標準由中華人民共和國國家旅遊局提出。

sentences.english: The national flag of PRC is red which stands for revolution.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國國旗，旗面爲紅色，象徵革命。

sentences.english: The Frontier Sanitation and Quarantine Law of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國國境衛生檢疫法。

sentences.english: Our national flag of the People's Republic of red symbolizes revolution.
sentences.chinese: 俺們中華人民共和國國旗的紅色象徵革命。

sentences.english: In 1990, it won the title of top-Quality Product by the Ministry of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 1990年被評爲中華人民共和國商業部部優產品。

sentences.english: When did P.R.China participate the Olympic Games?
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國什麼時候開始參加奧運會？

sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國防止沿海水域污染暫行規定。

sentences.english: This year marks the 60th anniversary of founding of the PRC.
sentences.chinese: 今年是中華人民共和國成立60週年。

sentences.english: October 1at. 1949 was the day when the PRC was founded.
sentences.chinese: 一九四九年十月一日是中華人民共和國成立的日子。

definition: special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区
to found a country/nation-building/the foundation of PRC by Mao Zedong in 1949
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
